column4: Due to statutory health protection regulations, there is no differentiation between illnesses and work-related illnesses in Germany. In addition, there is an occupational illness right in Germany, which is the responsibility of the employers' liability insurance association and does not allow data to be transferred for data protection reasons. The human rights risks are described in the Mercedes-Benz Group's @ Principles of Social Responsibility and Human Rights.
